body:
Do you have experience recovering private keys corresponding to an address in the keypool of a corrupted Dogecoin wallet.dat from end 2013 (non-HD). There is a change address which I cannot generate after the Client tried to salvage the wallet. 

Balance is visibile on the blockchain which was found by dumping the database using pywallet.py but without success finding the corresponding private key. Then used tool provided by BerkeleyDB db_dump with less aggressive salvage to dump the wallet it just doesn't generate the addresses private key.

i tried loading to litecoinqt and bitcoinqt regtest too it has time stamps for address but no key


Attempt to getnewaddress in Dogecoin Core leads to error: "ReseveKeyFromKeyPool: unknown key in key pool (code -1)"

This is an analogous issue with bitcoin: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/7463

Can provide further information if you have had any success with this before.


i will not send the wallet but you can reach me on linkedin @ linkedin.com/in/in-

__Originally posted by @etherx-dev in https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/issues/1879__
title: Do you have experience recovering private keys corresponding to an address in the keypool of a corrupted Dogecoin wallet.dat from end 2013 (non-HD). There is a change address which I cannot generate after the Client tried to salvage the wallet.
